about-me-body:
We at Tulis Event, dream and breathe the world of events. 
We have been initiating and producing events for over 10 years as an inspiring experience.
Public, Private, Conferences, Festivals, Fairs, Sporting Events, Social Events, Formation Days and more...
We offer a variety of solutions for events from the concept stage, through the careful planning to the day of the event itself.
We will accompany you and be with you throughout.
Concept selection, unique location - we will offer a variety of solutions for your event.
Our thinking is based on your thinking, the customer.
How would you like your event to look? We will offer - you decide.
Your event will have a unique, surprising character, one that your company's employees and guests have not seen
event-types-description: My events are tailored maid to suit your needs, whether it's a business event or a personal event
